blurb

Summary
Blurbs are used to compose messages for display on screen. These can be used for a variety of information, e.g.: phone scripts, cancellation policies, promotional material, etc. Blurbs support basic formattings (e.g.: bold, italics) and allow for a number of predefined variables which are automatically substituted when the real message is displayed. Blurbs can be defined for different domain contexts such as Job, Site, or Visit; and the specific variables that are available vary depending on the context.
